author: Kevin Puga S.
title: Fuertes lluvias en Cuenca continÃºan; los rÃ­os recuperan sus caudales
text:
Fuertes lluvias se registraron en Cuenca , en Azuay, la tarde de este jueves 12 de diciembre de 2024.
Ciudadanos reportaron las precipitaciones en redes sociales, en varios puntos de la ciudad , como por ejemplo, el Centro HistÃ³rico , el sector del Aeropuerto y el suroriente.
MÃ¡s noticias Estas condiciones atmosfÃ©ricas han sido comunes en los Ãºltimos dÃ­as, gracias a lo cual los rÃ­os de Cuenca recuperaron sus niveles normales .
Hasta la maÃ±ana de este jueves, este fue el estado de los cuatro rÃ­os :
Tomebamba : 4,03 mÂ³/s (normal) Yanuncay : 2,83 mÂ³/s (normal) MachÃ¡ngara : 2,85 mÂ³/s (normal) Tarqui : bajo 1,79 mÂ³/s (bajo) La ciudad suma 153 dÃ­as de sequÃ­a hidrolÃ³gica . SegÃºn la Red de la Empresa de Agua Potable y Alcantarillado ( Etapa EP ), hasta el 9 de diciembre, se necesitaban cinco dÃ­as adicionales de lluvias, para que esta situaciÃ³n finalice.
Se espera que hasta este fin de semana la caÃ­da de precipitaciones considerables permitan superar la sequÃ­a en la ciudad.
Para la noche de este jueves y madrugada del viernes, se pronostican temperaturas mÃ­nimas de 12 grados centÃ­grados en la capital de Azuay.
#Cuenca | ðŸŒ§ï¸ A esta hora se registran lluvias en diferentes sectores de la urbe azuaya.
ðŸš˜ Si estÃ¡ conduciendo, encienda las luces del vehÃ­culo y reduzca la velocidad.ðŸš¶â€â™€ï¸Si es peatÃ³n, camine y no corra.
ðŸ“²Llame al 9-1-1 en caso de emergencia. #ECU911BrindaSeguridadIntegral pic.twitter.com/JEdHzObre0
â€” CoordinaciÃ³n Zonal 6 ECU 911 Austro (@ECU911Austro) December 12, 2024 PronÃ³stico del clima en el resto de Ecuador El Instituto Nacional de MeteorologÃ­a e HidrologÃ­a ( Inamhi ) pronosticÃ³ lluvias y chubascos aislados en la regiÃ³n Interandina, Litoral, cordillera oriental y cordillera occidental del Litoral, para este jueves 12 de diciembre.
SegÃºn su Ãºltimo reporte, el clima en el Austro variarÃ¡ entre cielos parcialmente nublados , lloviznas y lluvias aisladas.
Mientras que en el resto de la Sierra , las provincias con mayores probabilidades de lluvia son: Carchi, Imbabura, Pichincha, Cotopaxi y Loja .
AmazonÃ­a y regiÃ³n Litoral En la AmazonÃ­a la situaciÃ³n serÃ¡ similar. Las lluvias aisladas y chubascos se presentarÃ¡n en Napo, Orellana y Zamora Chinchipe .
Finalmente, en la regiÃ³n Litoral, se prevÃ©n lluvias aisladas en ciertos sectores de Esmeraldas, ManabÃ­, Santo Domingo y Los RÃ­os . La temperatura mÃ¡xima es de 33Âº C en Guayaquil .
Para los prÃ³ximos dÃ­as, entre el 12 y 16 de diciembre, el Inamhi pronosticÃ³ lluvias de niveles medio y alto en Ecuador, que vendrÃ¡n acompaÃ±adas con tormentas y rÃ¡fagas de viento en gran parte del paÃ­s.
Estas serÃ¡n las zonas mÃ¡s afectadas :
RegiÃ³n Litoral : Mayor relevancia 12 y 13 de diciembre en la zona norte e interior la regiÃ³n (Esmeraldas, Santo Domingo y Los RÃ­os). RegiÃ³n Interandina : Mayor intensidad en Carchi, Imbabura, Pichincha, Cotopaxi y BolÃ­var (zonas de cordillera). RegiÃ³n AmazÃ³nica : Mayor intensidad en las estribaciones de la cordillera oriental (Zamora, Morona Santiago, Napo y SucumbÃ­os).

Â«La source de ces risques pour la sÃ©curitÃ© en mer et dans les airs vient de la surveillance rapprochÃ©e menÃ©e par des navires et des avions japonais et visant les activitÃ©s militaires normales de la Chine. La Chine exhorte le Japon Ã  mettre fin Ã  ce comportement dangereuxÂ», a rÃ©agi lors dâ€™un point de presse rÃ©gulier Lin Jian, un porte-parole du ministÃ¨re chinois des Affaires Ã©trangÃ¨res.

author: NewsBreak Original
title: STORM WATCH: Heavy rain arrives Saturday in New Jersey; flood watch issued for parts of state
text:
By Mike Rizzo ,
3 hours ago
A flood watch has been issued for parts of New Jersey. It's in effect for Saturday's rain and is expected to expire Sunday morning.
The counties include: Sussex, Warren, western Passaic, eastern Passaic, Hudson, western Bergen, eastern Bergen, western Essex, eastern Essex, western Union, eastern Union, Morris, Hunterdon, Somerset, Middlesex, western Monmouth, eastern Monmouth, Mercer, Salem, Gloucester, Camden, northwestern Burlington, Ocean, Cumberland, Atlantic, Cape May, Atlantic Coastal Cape May, Coastal Atlantic, Coastal Ocean and southeastern Burlington.
Today is not as windy but chilly and sunny with late clouds. Highs near 44. Rain develops after midnight and will be heavy at times through Saturday. It'll get better in the evening, and end something near or before sunset. The heaviest will be from sunrise to early afternoon.
Rivers may reach minor flood stage into the weekend across northern and central New Jersey with a total of 2-3" of rain expected statewide. Winds will not be much of an issue during the storm, but coastal gusts can reach 25-30 mph.
There's a possibility for higher-than-normal high tides on Sunday after the storm. Sunday is a better day with sunshine and cool temperatures as highs reach near 51.
Monday's weather will be nice, as highs reach near 55 under a sunny sky.
The weather becomes partly cloudy for mid-week with a passing shower or sprinkle on Wednesday. Otherwise, it remains mostly dry and nice.
Expand All Read in NewsBreak

author: admin
title: SONY â€œULT Power Soundâ€ heavy bass brand ULT WEAR headphones + ULT FIELD speakers new product debut
text:
Sony has just announced the release of the new â€œULT POWER SOUNDâ€ audio series, focusing on delivering heavy bass sound performance. This series includes a new headset and two Bluetooth speakers, all designed to bring a powerful bass experience to users.
The â€œULT POWER SOUNDâ€ series features a new branding strategy with the introduction of the â€œULTâ€ pronunciation, emphasizing the focus on strong bass effects. The ULT series includes the â€œULT WEARâ€ wireless headphones and â€œULT FIELDâ€ wireless speakers, both designed to enhance bass performance for different types of music.
The ULT WEAR headphones are equipped with a 40mm driver unit and a built-in V1 integrated processor to deliver impactful sound effects. They also feature an â€œULTâ€ button to switch between two levels of subwoofer mode, providing deep low-frequency bass or more powerful bass, depending on the userâ€™s preference.
Additionally, the ULT WEAR headphones support active noise reduction and have a wind noise reduction structure to enhance the listening experience. They also offer a long playback time of up to 50 hours (NC OFF) and support fast charging for convenience.
The ULT FIELD 1 and ULT FIELD 7 Bluetooth wireless speakers are designed for portable use and powerful sound performance. The ULT FIELD 1 speaker features a lanyard for easy hanging, while the ULT FIELD 7 speaker is larger in size and can provide deep bass performance.
Both speakers support dual-machine connection and â€œParty Modeâ€ to connect multiple speakers for a stereo playback system. The ULT FIELD 1 and 7 speakers are expected to be released in July 2024, offering flexibility and versatility for users seeking a high-quality audio experience.
With the release of the â€œULT POWER SOUNDâ€ series, Sony continues to innovate and deliver premium audio products that cater to the needs of music lovers who appreciate heavy bass effects.
